heroTitle:
Ethereum Buenos Aires is a forum for
developers, entrepreneurs, and enthusiasts
to learn about and develop for Ethereum
about:
Ethereum Buenos Aires is about empowering participants to shape this new world,
 while cementing the Latin American region as a thriving hub of Ethereum blockchain innovation.
communityText: We encourage developers, technologists, cypher punks, coders, crypto-economists, designers, makers to get involved. Our ecosystem is bottom up. Emergent.
networkingText: We want to create a unique space that helps the community to Grow and connect with the World.
educationText: Due it’s political and economic history, Argentina has become a very fertile ground for blockchain ideas. We encourage newcomers to learn while experiencing the technology.
getInvolvedText: We welcome and encourage any company that wants to be involved in LATAM or the local community to join us.
ourEvents:
Our events are open to anyone interested
on the subject, regardless of previous
experience
